subject: United States Women's Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Michelle Wie rallied from four strokes back entering the day to shoot a five-under 67 and win the L.P.G.A. Lotte Championship in Kapolei, Hawaii.
snippet: Michelle Wie rallied from four strokes back entering the day to shoot a five-under 67 and win the L.P.G.A. Lotte Championship in Kapolei, Hawaii.
